content.description:
Start on Hotness and do the starting move then move through the crimp traverse left. Make the long reach around the corner to the crimp rail below the bigger hold on Lovely. Bump your right hand down to the fin feature. Bump left hand to the big hold of Lovely and top out on Lovely.

 Super fun problem because of the variety of features to experiment with. I found the fin to be the most accessible for making the left hand crux bump.
content.location:
On the "Beauty Boulder", from the parking lot head straight down the hill and turn right onto a dirt path. Continue along the trail, the boulder is visible uphill after passing ~2 manholes after the second wooden bridge.

 Problem starts on the right corner of the boulder as you are facing uphill.

content.description: Far left of the "Beauty Boulder" SDS left crimp and right 2 finger pocket. Crimp up through the face and mantle up. Don't use the tree to top out.
content.location: West (right) from the beach.  Locate Jubblies. The "Beauty Boulder" is 100 feet straight up the hill.

content.description: SDS on the far right arete. Launch through jugs to an easy finish at the tallest point on the boulder.
content.location: West (right) from the beach. Locate Jubblies. The "Beauty Boulder" is 100 feet straight up the hill.
